StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UndistributedEarningsDiluted.label: Undistributed Earnings, Diluted
UndistributedEarningsDiluted.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed. Includes the adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Diluted
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

UndistributedEarningsOfDomesticSubsidiar.label: Undistributed Earnings of Domestic Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfDomesticSubsidiar.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of domestic subsidiaries or domestic joint ventures intended to be permanent.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

PreferredStockValueOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Outstanding
PreferredStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Tax Credits
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

DepreciationAndAmortizationDiscontinuedO.label: Depreciation and Amortization, Discontinued Operations
DepreciationAndAmortizationDiscontinuedO.description: Amount of deprecation and amortization expense attributable to property, plant and equipment and intangible assets of discontinued operations.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Including Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing, Interest Rate
AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.description: Reflects the effective interest rate as of the balance sheet date on interest-bearing trade payables.

DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLos.label: Debt and Equity Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLos.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DefinedContributionPlanNumberOfEmployees.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Number of Employees
DefinedContributionPlanNumberOfEmployees.description: Number of employees eligible to participate in defined contribution plan.

DepositLiabilitiesAccruedInterest.label: Deposit Liabilities, Accrued Interest
DepositLiabilitiesAccruedInterest.description: Amount of accrued but unpaid interest on deposit liabilities.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedLoss.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Loss
EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedLoss.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansHeldFor.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Held-for-sale or Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansHeldFor.description: This is the principal amount outstanding for loans which are in the process of being securitized as of the date of the statement of financial position (across all types of loans).

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

SubordinatedBorrowingInterestRate.label: Subordinated Borrowing, Interest Rate
SubordinatedBorrowingInterestRate.description: Stated interest rate of the subordinated debt.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentInterest.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment, Interest
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentInterest.description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to interest.

DirectFinancingLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
DirectFinancingLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.label: Gain (Loss) on Termination of Lease
GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.description: Amount of gain (loss) on termination of lease before expiration of lease term.

PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Productive Assets
PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from purchases, sales and disposals of property, plant and equipment and other productive assets, including intangibles.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

SeveranceCosts1.label: Severance Costs
SeveranceCosts1.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuatio.label: Deferred Taxes, Business Combination, Valuation Allowance, Available to Reduce Income Tax Expense
DeferredTaxesBusinessCombinationValuatio.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's income tax expense (after such benefits are first being applied to reduce goodwill and then other noncurrent intangible assets to zero).

OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.
